text: Tonight @BYU (the only college football team West of Texas with a season) kicks off the much needed college football season against Navy! Go Cougs!!

There’s still time to do your part to ensure an accurate Census count. Go to http://2020Census.gov to fill out the questionnaire and make sure your community is not only represented but receives the federal resources it needs.

Wildfires can start easily in California, especially in dry conditions. Every one of us must do our part to ensure we don’t spark a wildfire. The safety of your entire community depends on it. https://twitter.com/abc7newsbayarea/status/1302815249196752902 QT @abc7newsbayarea THIS JUST IN: Fire officials say "a smoke generating pyrotechnic device" used during a gender reveal party caused San Bernadino County's #ElDoradoFire in Southern California. https://abc7news.com/7050-acre-fire-continues-to-rage-near-yucaipa/6411372/

This #LaborDay, as we remember those who battled for fair wages and safe working conditions, we must recognize that our work is not over. The fight continues to ensure every worker in America has the rights, dignity and pay they deserve.

RT @JoeBiden It's not enough to just thank our essential workers — we need to pay them. As president, I’ll:

- Raise the minimum wage to $15
- End the tipped minimum wage
- End the sub-minimum wage for people with disabilities
- Ensure everyone has strong benefits

RT @KamalaHarris Here’s what separates @JoeBiden and me from Donald Trump and Mike Pence: We know that educators, electrical workers, and working Americans are the true backbone of the American economy—not CEOs and hedge fund managers. And when elected, we will work every day to deliver for them.

The President’s attack on our right to cast our ballots without risking our health in a pandemic is a confession of his weakness with voters & contempt for fair elections and for our Constitution.

We won’t be intimidated by his assault on our democracy –  we will #vote him out. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1303136484061597697/pu/img/-TjLdNDQys0cV90z.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1303136484061597697/pu/vid/480x270/QpaRSdJgGayxa3oW.mp4?tag=10

On this #LaborDay in particular, America owes an even greater debt of gratitude to essential workers who have been the backbone for our communities in this covid-19 pandemic.

Our thanks must be matched with PPE, living wages, union rights, and workplace safety.

My grandfather's union membership gave him better wages & benefits that got our family out of poverty & into the middle class. I celebrate #LaborDay with a deep appreciation for the right to organize & why I'm here today. We must always fight for workers’ rights.

Gig economy companies like @Uber and @amazon misclassify their employees as contractors to skirt their responsibilities to their workers. I’m fighting to close these anti-worker loopholes – #LaborDay and every day. https://www.cnbc.com/2020/08/17/elizabeth-warren-op-ed-uber-lyft-and-other-gig-economy-companies-misclassify-workers.html

We know the Postmaster General is sabotaging the @USPS. And now we’ve learned that he may have broken federal and state campaign finance laws. Louis DeJoy must resign – and if he won’t, the Board of Governors should use their power to remove him. https://www.washingtonpost.com/investigations/louis-dejoy-campaign-contributions/2020/09/06/1187bc2c-e3fe-11ea-8181-606e603bb1c4_story.html

This #LaborDay2020 weekend, I’m fighting for workers on the frontlines of this pandemic. We still need an Essential Workers Bill of Rights to get workers the premium pay, safety protections, paid leave, and bargaining rights that they deserve. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhU-b3sX0AETHko.jpg

Wishing everyone a safe and happy #LaborDay2020 – including our essential workers still risking their health to keep our country running. Today we remember: unions built America’s middle class, and unions will rebuild America’s middle class.

The wealthy and well-connected always had a powerful voice in this country—workers and labor unions fought to make sure the people had a voice, too. And we need a strong labor movement now more than ever to make sure that voice is heard loud and clear.

Unions were on the front lines in the fights for a minimum wage, Social Security, Medicare, and voting rights. They built the middle class and they'll rebuild the middle class. There are no limits to what we can achieve when we put power in the hands of working people.

For Labor Day, I wrote in @Cosmopolitan about how women are getting us through this crisis. They deserve a break, a chance to get ahead, and an economy that works for them. Donald Trump doesn’t get that, but @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris do. https://www.cosmopolitan.com/politics/a33935675/elizabeth-warren-women-coronavirus-pandemic-labor-day/
Happy Independence Day to the people of #Brazil. We join your nation and Brazilian-Americans in celebrating this important festivity. 🇧🇷🇺🇸

Every American deserves the ability to provide for their families and build a better future for their children.
 
This #LaborDay, Sen. Rubio honors the American worker. He will keep fighting to make dignified work possible for all. We need an economy that serves all our families. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhUfJSLWAAAdCeR.jpg

Great question from an Air Force Veteran. If you hate war, you can’t agree with Biden’s decades of support for intervention and war! Time to bring even more troops home 🇺🇸 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1302611477912866816/pu/img/7FFkfw1xWrgePSXX.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1302611477912866816/pu/vid/320x568/tGCY2Mv1fGdRvm9S.mp4?tag=10

As we celebrate Labor Day let us not forget that in recent months, while the very rich have grown much richer, tens of millions of workers have lost their jobs, and many families are now struggling to put food on the table and avoid eviction. Congress must act to protect workers.

Strong unions mean decent wages and a strong middle class.

Congress must make it easier for workers to join unions and engage in collective bargaining.

We must end the heavy-handed corporate tactics that prevent workers from unionizing.

RT @RightsVT Next Monday! Sen. Bernie Sanders and singer/songwriter Myra Flynn will be joining our exciting line-up of speakers for Labor Day 2020! 

Join us for this special celebration focused on building a movement for a just transition to an equitable future!

RSVP:https://www.facebook.com/events/783009925803185?acontext={"action_history":[{"surface":"page","mechanism":"page_admin_bar","extra_data":"{\"page_id\":540961639395670}"},{"surface":"events_admin_tool","mechanism":"events_admin_tool","extra_data":"[]"}],"has_source":true} http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Egxqr7pXkAAseBX.jpg

On this Labor Day we must pledge to end starvation wages in America. Raising the minimum wage to at least $15 per hour will give 40 million workers a long overdue pay raise, and a shred of human dignity.

On this Labor Day let us not forget that over the last 30 years the top 1% have seen a $22 trillion increase in their wealth, while the bottom half of the American people have actually seen a decline in their wealth. We need an economy that works for all, not just the few.

As we celebrate Labor Day I want to thank all of America's workers for what you do.

Thank you to all of the essential workers who are quite literally putting their lives on the line.

Let us create an economy that works for all, and not just the few. #LaborDay2020
Getting cleaned up for resumption of the Senate. Better salon than Pelosi’s! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhVRNvYXsAAqPKE.jpg

Here’s what separates @JoeBiden and me from Donald Trump and Mike Pence: We know that educators, electrical workers, and working Americans are the true backbone of the American economy—not CEOs and hedge fund managers. And when elected, we will work every day to deliver for them.

RT @JoeBiden It's not enough to just thank our essential workers — we need to pay them. As president, I’ll:

- Raise the minimum wage to $15
- End the tipped minimum wage
- End the sub-minimum wage for people with disabilities
- Ensure everyone has strong benefits

.@JoeBiden is right. We must build a future that not only offers good-paying jobs, but protections and dignity for all workers. https://twitter.com/JoeBiden/status/1303011396041486340 QT @JoeBiden Together, we can build a future that reflects working people’s courage and ambition. One that not only offers good jobs — but the dignity, equity, shared prosperity, and common purpose due to every American. https://www.post-gazette.com/opinion/Op-Ed/2020/09/07/Joe-Biden-Richard-Trumka-Put-power-back-in-workers-hands-Labor-Movement-Unions/stories/202009040046

There’s no better day than Labor Day to spend time with union members in Wisconsin. The work labor unions do each and every day matters. It's because of them and the determination of workers across our country that we have overtime pay, worker protections, and more. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhWUX8nXkAcWdXY.jpg

Laced up and ready to win.
http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1303001429557350400/pu/img/jiVdzXQEu9KCQ1cW.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1303001429557350400/pu/vid/480x270/umVcEIBiDPlGUbUL.mp4?tag=10

Strong unions built the American middle class—everything from a 40-hour work week to paid leave was because of workers who organized and fought. And when @JoeBiden and I are in the White House, advancing worker rights will be a priority.

RT @DrBiden I’ve been an educator for more than 30 years.

NEA is my union.
 
Our campaign is honored to have the support of educators and the endorsement of the @NEAToday and @AFTunion, two of the largest unions in the country.
 
Today and always, I honor educators. Happy Labor Day.

RT @TeamJoe We look to the past to shape the future of this country.

The #LaborMovement equipped us with the tools to ensure that we can protect, support, & create paths for success for the working-class.

Learn about Joe’s plan to create more good-paying union jobs: https://joebiden.com/build-back-better/

As the pandemic still rages, essential workers—who are disproportionately Black, people of color, immigrants, women, and members of other marginalized communities—continue to sacrifice so much. Today, we pay tribute to them. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhVLe8wWkAwrIGf.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1303029341023014912/vid/320x320/cde3MzRcKvkvuYNC.mp4?tag=13

This Labor Day, returning to the status quo isn’t good enough for American workers and working families. We need to build back better.

That starts with one word: Unions.
https://www.detroitnews.com/story/opinion/2020/09/07/opinion-kamala-harris-shuler-unions-help-america-build-back-better-after-covid-19/5735248002/

RT @JoeBiden Today, we honor the generations of union workers who fought for the rights, power, wages, and benefits that built and sustained the great American middle class. #LaborDay http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhUTK3fWkAI7Tkq.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1302967883228737542/vid/320x320/7uKYD4ojhwOiK35O.mp4?tag=13

To all the workers who have kept our country going: Thank you. From those essential workers picking up another early shift to front line health care workers working on extra shifts, your nation owes you a debt of gratitude. We will keep fighting for you.

This Labor Day, we celebrate workers and the tireless work of the trade union movement for equal rights and economic justice. Together, we will continue the fight to expand workers’ rights and build an economy based on human needs, not greed.

4/x “‘...And people don’t realize that. They want to praise him, but he didn’t do nothing. He didn’t do s###.’ The Trump administration’s efforts to prioritize the Superfund site in her home town have made her a believer. She’s getting into local politics [now] as a Republican.”

3/x “...because of the Trump administration’s EPA. ‘I’ve been a Democrat all my life,’ Worley-Jenkins says. ‘Trump actually gives us money to clean up these sites that have been here forever,’ she says. ‘Obama talked a lot of crap, but did very little...’”

2/x “...has showed what it can look like when an administration gets serious about cleaning up long-neglected sites. Some of these activists are voting Republican for the first time in their lives. Some have seen their backyards and communities finally cleaned up...”

1/x Fascinating article. Lots of editorial snark, but the underlying point is important: Trump EPA prioritizing cleaning up the air & water, and produced MUCH GREATER RESULTS in actually cleaning up the environment. 

Politico: “The EPA under Trump...” https://www.politico.com/news/magazine/2020/09/07/superfund-activists-donald-trump-minden-wv-400921

RT @byrdinator Evan and I were at the beach last week when this man drowned. Luis was in the water with two of his partner Maria’s daughters when they got too deep. He kept the girls afloat long enough for us to rescue them. https://www.gofundme.com/f/raising-money-for-luiss-funeral

Some angry Lefty actor thinks California is the only place that has Summer. It’s hot everywhere—try Texas every summertime—but the rest of the country doesn’t have such a dysfunctional state govt that you can’t turn the lights on or run A/C. That’s a policy failure of the Dems. https://twitter.com/stevepasquale/status/1303062847681966080 QT @StevePasquale Asshole, it’s climate change related 120 fucking degrees in LA.

Let’s push all the Ac’s to the max so the power grid goes down too?

There is no way you are this stupid. https://twitter.com/tedcruz/status/1303044924259151874

Chris, California can’t keep the friggin’ lights on. Will you admit that’s screwed up? (Of course not.) https://twitter.com/chrislhayes/status/1303047257940463618 QT @chrislhayes Cruz went on a whole long thing about how the climate is not actually warming when I interviewed him last year. https://twitter.com/tedcruz/status/1303044924259151874

We need every Californian to help conserve energy. Please do your part. #FlexAlert

American workers deserve a living wage, good benefits, the right to unionize, and strong workplace safety standards.

Let us stand in solidarity with the labor movement today and every day thereafter in the struggle for economic justice. #LaborDay

Over generations, working people across America built the middle class and secured progress for hard-working families. House Democrats are unified in our commitment to America’s working families. Happy #LaborDay! https://www.speaker.gov/newsroom/9720 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhUjf5MWkAIwJ8k.jpg

On each day you shall pay the servant’s wages before the sun goes down, since the servant is poor and is counting on them. Otherwise the servant will cry to the LORD against you, and you will be held guilty.

Deuteronomy 24:15
